attributes.action: Make a constitutional mechanism to call an election against the gov if it fails
attributes.background: Generate a method a failing government can be forced to call a general election constitutionally outside of the regular means by which a general election is called

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We are unsure who you want to be able to request a General Election and how government failure could be assessed.

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702341

Please see also the following:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/no-confidence-motions-and-early-general-elections/
